content: resisthence hat for emotional support chicken by annette corsino materials 20/10g yards of worsted weight size us7/4 5 tapestry needle note hat can be knit in the round on double pointed needles just change purl row to knit instructions cast on 40sts row 1-12 *k1 p1* row 13 purl row 14 knit row 15 purl row 16 k1 k2tog *k to 3sts before marker ssk k1 sm k1 k2tog 32 row 17 purl row 18 k1 k2tog *k to 3sts before marker ssk k1 sm k1 k2tog 24 row 19 purl row 20 k1 k2tog *k to 3sts before marker ssk k1 sm k1 k2tog 16 row 21 purl row 22 k2tog ssk sm k2tog ssk sm k2tog ssk sm k2tog ssk 8 row 23 purl row 24 k2tog ssk k2tog ssk 4 row 25 purl row 26 k2tog k2 3 make a 1 25 icord on the remaining sts sew seam closed from bottom to top of hat feed tail up through icord and tie a knot around end cut live loops for fringe fold up brim and tackdown stuff hat lightly with polyfil so hat sits on top of esc s head ©2026the knitting tree l a theknittingtreela com
